Title: All That Glitters...
Description:
<Having recently defeated the Time Anomaly in this timeway, you notice this golden vase glittering.

It is extremely worn, be it by time or something else. You can't make out the details of its carvings along the edges.

Battered as it is, it still manages to give off a warm light, contrasting the chill here. 

It looks very out of place. Soridormi may be interested in it.>
ObjectivesText: Return to Soridormi in the Tyrhold Reservoir.
